        public static void setEMC(int id,
          int data,
          int EMC)
        Add or set the EMC value of a single item. If EMC = 0, it will remove the EMC value of that item.
        See Also:
        removeEMC(int, int)

      • removeEMC

        public static void removeEMC(int id,
             int data)
        Remove the EMC value of an item. WARNING: If that item is also used as fuel, unexpected behavior may occur.
